verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and to<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> saying<WH559> unto<WH413> them,

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> These<WH2063> are the beasts<WH2416> which<WH834> ye shall eat<WH398> among all<WH4480> <WH3605> the beasts<WH929> that<WH834> are on<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>
Whatsoever <WH3605> parteth<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and is cloven-footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> <WH6541> and cheweth<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> among the beasts,<WH929> that shall ye eat.<WH398>

Nevertheless <WH389> <WH853> these<WH2088> shall ye not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of them that chew<WH4480> <WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> or of them that divide<WH4480> <WH6536> the hoof:<WH6541> as<WH853> the camel,<WH1581> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> cheweth<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divideth<WH6536> not<WH369> the hoof;<WH6541> he<WH1931> is unclean<WH2931> unto you.
And the coney,<WH8227> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> cheweth<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divideth<WH6536> not<WH3808> the hoof;<WH6541> he<WH1931> is unclean<WH2931> unto you.
And the hare,<WH768> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> cheweth<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divideth<WH6536> not<WH3808> the hoof;<WH6541> he<WH1931> is unclean<WH2931> unto you.

And the swine,<WH2386> though<WH3588> he<WH1931> divide<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and be cloven-footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> <WH6541> yet he<WH1931> cheweth<WH1641> not<WH3808> the cud;<WH1625> he<WH1931> is unclean<WH2931> to you.
Of their flesh<WH4480> <WH1320> shall ye not<WH3808> eat,<WH398> and their carcass<WH5038> shall ye not<WH3808> touch;<WH5060> they<WH1992> are unclean<WH2931> to you.

<WH853> These<WH2088> shall ye eat<WH398> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> that<WH834> are in the waters:<WH4325> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> hath fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> in the waters,<WH4325> in the seas,<WH3220> and in the rivers,<WH5158> them shall ye eat.<WH398>

And all<WH3605> that<WH834> have not<WH369> fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> in the seas,<WH3220> and in the rivers,<WH5158> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> that move<WH8318> in the waters,<WH4325> and of any<WH4480> <WH3605> living<WH2416> thing<WH5315> which<WH834> is in the waters,<WH4325> they<WH1992> shall be an abomination<WH8263> unto you:
They shall be<WH1961> even an abomination<WH8263> unto you; ye shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> of their flesh,<WH4480> <WH1320> but ye shall have their carcasses in abomination.<WH8262> <WH853> <WH5038>
Whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> hath no<WH369> fins<WH5579> nor scales<WH7193> in the waters,<WH4325> that<WH1931> shall be an abomination<WH8263> unto you.

And these<WH428> are they which ye shall have in abomination<WH8262> among<WH4480> the fowls;<WH5775> they shall not<WH3808> be eaten,<WH398> they<WH1992> are an abomination:<WH8263> <WH853> the eagle,<WH5404> and the ossifrage,<WH6538> and the osprey,<WH5822>
And the vulture,<WH1676> and the kite<WH344> after his kind;<WH4327>
<WH853> Every<WH3605> raven<WH6158> after his kind;<WH4327>
And the owl,<WH1323> <WH3284> and the night hawk,<WH8464> and the cuckoo,<WH7828> and the hawk<WH5322> after his kind,<WH4327>
And the little owl,<WH3563> and the cormorant,<WH7994> and the great owl,<WH3244>
And the swan,<WH8580> and the pelican,<WH6893> and the gier-eagle,<WH7360>
And the stork,<WH2624> the heron<WH601> after her kind,<WH4327> and the lapwing,<WH1744> and the bat.<WH5847>
All <WH3605> fowls<WH5775> that creep,<WH8318> going<WH1980> upon<WH5921> all four,<WH702> shall be an abomination<WH8263> unto you.

Yet <WH389> <WH853> these<WH2088> may ye eat<WH398> of every<WH4480> <WH3605> flying<WH5775> creeping thing<WH8318> that goeth<WH1980> upon<WH5921> all four,<WH702> which<WH834> have legs<WH3767> above<WH4480> <WH4605> their feet,<WH7272> to leap<WH5425> withal<WH2004> upon<WH5921> the earth;<WH776>

Even <WH853> these<WH428> of<WH4480> them ye may eat;<WH398> <WH853> the locust<WH697> after his kind,<WH4327> and the bald locust<WH5556> after his kind,<WH4327> and the beetle<WH2728> after his kind,<WH4327> and the grasshopper<WH2284> after his kind.<WH4327>
But all<WH3605> other flying<WH5775> creeping things,<WH8318> which<WH834> have four<WH702> feet,<WH7272> shall be an abomination<WH8263> unto you.
And for these<WH428> ye shall be unclean:<WH2930> whosoever<WH3605> toucheth<WH5060> the carcass<WH5038> of them shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>
And whosoever<WH3605> beareth<WH5375> aught of the carcass<WH4480> <WH5038> of them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

The carcasses of every<WH3605> beast<WH929> which<WH834> divideth<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and is not<WH369> cloven-footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> nor<WH369> cheweth<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> are unclean<WH2931> unto you: every one<WH3605> that toucheth<WH5060> them shall be unclean.<WH2930>

And whatsoever<WH3605> goeth<WH1980> upon<WH5921> his paws,<WH3709> among all manner<WH3605> of beasts<WH2416> that go<WH1980> on<WH5921> all four,<WH702> those<WH1992> are unclean<WH2931> unto you: whoso<WH3605> toucheth<WH5060> their carcass<WH5038> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

And he that beareth<WH5375> <WH853> the carcass<WH5038> of them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even:<WH6153> they<WH1992> are unclean<WH2931> unto you.

These <WH2088> also shall be unclean<WH2931> unto you among the creeping things<WH8318> that creep<WH8317> upon<WH5921> the earth;<WH776> the weasel,<WH2467> and the mouse,<WH5909> and the tortoise<WH6632> after his kind,<WH4327>
And the ferret,<WH604> and the chameleon,<WH3581> and the lizard,<WH3911> and the snail,<WH2546> and the mole.<WH8580>

These <WH428> are unclean<WH2931> to you among all<WH3605> that creep:<WH8318> whosoever<WH3605> doth touch<WH5060> them, when they be dead,<WH4194> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

And upon<WH5921> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> any of<WH4480> them, when they are dead,<WH4194> doth fall,<WH5307> it shall be unclean;<WH2930> whether it be any<WH4480> <WH3605> vessel<WH3627> of wood,<WH6086> or<WH176> raiment,<WH899> or<WH176> skin,<WH5785> or<WH176> sack,<WH8242> whatsoever<WH3605> vessel<WH3627> it be, wherein<WH834> any work<WH4399> is done,<WH6213> it must be put<WH935> into water,<WH4325> and it shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even;<WH6153> so it shall be cleansed.<WH2891>

And every<WH3605> earthen<WH2789> vessel,<WH3627> whereinto<WH834> <WH413> <WH8432> any of<WH4480> them falleth,<WH5307> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> is in<WH8432> it shall be unclean;<WH2930> and ye shall break<WH7665> it.

Of all<WH4480> <WH3605> meat<WH400> which<WH834> may be eaten,<WH398> that on<WH5921> which<WH834> such water<WH4325> cometh<WH935> shall be unclean:<WH2930> and all<WH3605> drink<WH4945> that<WH834> may be drunk<WH8354> in every<WH3605> such vessel<WH3627> shall be unclean.<WH2930>

And every<WH3605> thing whereupon<WH834> <WH5921> any part of their carcass<WH4480> <WH5038> falleth<WH5307> shall be unclean;<WH2930> whether it be oven,<WH8574> or ranges for pots,<WH3600> they shall be broken down:<WH5422> for they<WH1992> are unclean,<WH2931> and shall be<WH1961> unclean<WH2931> unto you.

Nevertheless <WH389> a fountain<WH4599> or pit,<WH953> wherein there is plenty<WH4723> of water,<WH4325> shall be<WH1961> clean:<WH2889> but that which toucheth<WH5060> their carcass<WH5038> shall be unclean.<WH2930>
And if<WH3588> any part of<WH4480> their carcass<WH5038> fall<WH5307> upon<WH5921> any<WH3605> sowing<WH2221> seed<WH2233> which<WH834> is to be sown,<WH2232> it<WH1931> shall be clean.<WH2889>

But if<WH3588> any water<WH4325> be put<WH5414> upon<WH5921> the seed,<WH2233> and any part of their carcass<WH4480> <WH5038> fall<WH5307> thereon,<WH5921> it<WH1931> shall be unclean<WH2931> unto you.
And if<WH3588> any beast,<WH929> of<WH4480> which<WH834> ye may eat,<WH402> die;<WH4191> he that toucheth<WH5060> the carcass<WH5038> thereof shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

And he that eateth<WH398> of the carcass<WH4480> <WH5038> of it shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even:<WH6153> he also that beareth<WH5375> <WH853> the carcass<WH5038> of it shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>
And every<WH3605> creeping thing<WH8318> that creepeth<WH8317> upon<WH5921> the earth<WH776> shall be an abomination;<WH8263> it shall not<WH3808> be eaten.<WH398>

Whatsoever <WH3605> goeth<WH1980> upon<WH5921> the belly,<WH1512> and whatsoever<WH3605> goeth<WH1980> upon<WH5921> all four,<WH702> or whatsoever<WH3605> hath more<WH7235> feet<WH7272> among all<WH3605> creeping things<WH8318> that creep<WH8317> upon<WH5921> the earth,<WH776> them ye shall not<WH3808> eat;<WH398> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> are an abomination.<WH8263>

Ye shall not<WH408> make yourselves abominable<WH8262> <WH853> <WH5315> with any<WH3605> creeping thing<WH8318> that creepeth,<WH8317> neither<WH3808> shall ye make yourselves unclean<WH2930> with them, that ye should be defiled<WH2930> thereby.

For <WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves,<WH6942> and ye shall be<WH1961> holy;<WH6918> for<WH3588> I<WH589> am holy:<WH6918> neither<WH3808> shall ye defile<WH2930> <WH853> yourselves<WH5315> with any manner<WH3605> of creeping thing<WH8318> that creepeth<WH7430> upon<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>

For <WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> that bringeth you up<WH5927> <WH853> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to be<WH1961> your God:<WH430> ye shall therefore be<WH1961> holy,<WH6918> for<WH3588> I<WH589> am holy.<WH6918>

This <WH2063> is the law<WH8451> of the beasts,<WH929> and of the fowl,<WH5775> and of every<WH3605> living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that moveth<WH7430> in the waters,<WH4325> and of every<WH3605> creature<WH5315> that creepeth<WH8317> upon<WH5921> the earth: <WH776>

To make a difference<WH914> between<WH996> the unclean<WH2931> and the clean,<WH2889> and between<WH996> the beast<WH2416> that may be eaten<WH398> and the beast<WH2416> that<WH834> may not<WH3808> be eaten.<WH398>
